issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Almost complete implementation.

Extends Evented.

Need to remove the following unsupported and platform specific methods and constants:
* createDashboardItem()
* createDashboardView()
* INPUT_BUTTONMODE_ALWAYS
* INPUT_BUTTONMODE_NEVER
* INPUT_BUTTONMODE_ONBLUR
* INPUT_BUTTONMODE_ONFOCUS
* KEYBOARD_APPEARANCE_ALERT
* KEYBOARD_APPEARANCE_DEFAULT
* KEYBOARD_ASCII
* KEYBOARD_DEFAULT
* KEYBOARD_EMAIL
* KEYBOARD_NAMEPHONE_PAD

Update API docs with supported methods, properties, and constants:
* create2DMatrix()
* createEmailDialog()
* createOptionDialog()
* createPickerColumn()
* createProgressBar()
* createScrollableView()
* createToolbar()
* FACE_DOWN
* FACE_UP
* INPUT_BORDERSTYLE_BEZEL
* INPUT_BORDERSTYLE_LINE
* INPUT_BORDERSTYLE_NONE
* INPUT_BORDERSTYLE_ROUNDED
* LANDSCAPE_LEFT
* LANDSCAPE_RIGHT
* PICKER_TYPE_COUNT_DOWN_TIMER
* PICKER_TYPE_DATE
* PICKER_TYPE_DATE_AND_TIME
* PICKER_TYPE_PLAIN
* PICKER_TYPE_TIME
* PORTRAIT
* TEXT_ALIGNMENT_CENTER
* TEXT_ALIGNMENT_RIGHT
* TEXT_ALIGNMENT_LEFT
* TEXT_AUTOCAPITALIZATION_ALL
* TEXT_AUTOCAPITALIZATION_NONE
* TEXT_AUTOCAPITALIZATION_SENTENCES
* TEXT_AUTOCAPITALIZATION_WORDS
* TEXT_VERTICAL_ALIGNMENT_BOTTOM
* TEXT_VERTICAL_ALIGNMENT_CENTER
* TEXT_VERTICAL_ALIGNMENT_TOP
* UNKNOWN
* UPSIDE_PORTRAIT

comments.body: Closing ticket as MobileWeb is no longer supported.
